document.docAuthor: Ghahari, Hassan, Moulet, Pierre & Rider, David A.
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

subSubSection.paragraph: General distribution. Europe (except Great Britain , Scandinavia), North Africa, Near East, Central Asia.

Host plants. On lucerne, sesame, other legumes and Elaeagnaceae family plants (
Farahbakhsh 1961
;
Modarres Awal 1997 b
),
Verbascum
sp. ( Scrophulariaceae ),
Triticum
sp. ( Poaceae ) (
Modarres Awal 1996 a
),
Rosa
sp. ( Rosaceae ) (
Modarres Awal 1996 a
,
1997 b
), cornel, tamarisk (
Modarres Awal 1997 b
),
Rosa damascene
( Rosaceae ) (Sakenin et al . 2008 ),
Daucus
sp. ( Apiaceae ),
Cichorium
sp.,
Cirsium
sp. (both Asteraceae ),
Sinapis
sp. ( Brassicaceae ) (
Nateq Golestan et al . 2011
),
Acroptilon repens , Taraxacum
sp. ( Asteraceae ),
Atriplex
sp. ( Chenopodiaceae ),
Berberis vulgaris
( Berberidaceae ),
Hordeum vulgare
( Poaceae ),
Marrubium
sp. ( Lamiaceae ),
Raphanus
sp. ( Brassicaceae ) (
Nateq Golestan & Modarres Awal 2012
), herbaceous plants such as Asteraceae and
Apiaceae (Linnavuori 2012 )
and cereals (
Modarres Awal 1997 b
); caught on several Lamiaceae , Caprifoliaceae ,
Chenopodiaceae (Ribes & Pagola Carte 2013 )
.
